reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater soft and cozy, with nice colors and good quality. The fit and length receive mixed feedback - while some say it fits nicely and has a perfect length, others mention it runs big and is too short. The flattering aspect also gets mixed reviews, with some finding it flattering while others disagree.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality, love this, beautiful sweater
items.body: When it first arrived it appeared to be very boxy (see last pic of sweater on floor with feet to show how large) however I really loved the soft, and stretchy material. When I put it on it fit prefect and doesn't look boxy at all. The sleeves are a bell sleeve which gives it character. I bought it in a small after reading other reviews and typically wear a medium. However it fits to my wrist and I would usually prefer it to go down a little longer on my wrist. But overall I'm really glad I got the small bc it does fit well and I like to pull my sleeves up on my arms a lot. So the small was a great choice for me. Can't tell you enough how much I love it! Great quality! Beautiful sweater. Love the block out style different colors and bell sleevesl. Read more
items.author: Cynthia Torres

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Size Bust not as stated on size chart
items.body: not true to size in the bust area. Having to return other than that it is a beautiful sweater. Read more
items.author: Janice Morgan

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Real & Useful Information
items.body: The reason for my title is that I'm tired of reviews where people say TTS and that's it. TTS for some might not be the same for another and without providing any other information the reply of "TTS" is of no use to me. So, I'm going to give you my review and it might be more than you are wanting but here it goes. I'm 5'8" and 175" lbs. I am a 38DDD and would say I'm of a medium build. Not broad through the shoulders but certainly not petite. I purchased the 216 Gray in a Large in the Black/Gray/Cream colorway. I would say this sweater is certainly not heavy weight. It's more of a medium to light weight. It's not see through at all. It has a nice soft quality to it. I would say this runs a tad on the large size. I debated if I wanted to return for a Medium but decided to keep the large for a bit of a slouchy look with jeans or leggings. It has a longer ribbed cuff that can be worn all the way down and pushed up on the arm or just simply cuff it. It's also a batwing (Dolman) sleeve meaning that it is cut wide at the shoulders, deep arm holes and tapers to a thin cuff. I would personally say this isn't a boxy cut but sits about at my hips, so lower than my belt on my medium rise jeans. It did come in a vacuum sealed package which did cause it to be very wrinkly, however, I think a steamer or tossed in the dryer on air with maybe a damp cloth would easily take the wrinkles out. All in all I'd say this was a very nice sweater and a fair price point. Hope this answers a lot of questions. Read more
items.author: Karen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Soft, great quality!
items.body: Love this! I am very surprised at this purchase. Material is thick and so cozy and soft. The fit in the sleeves is just right! It does run a little big. I normally wear smalls and I feel like if they made an extra small I would have purchased that but I actually am loving the oversized thing this sweater has going for it. Only two cons is: The bodice of the sweater is kind of boxy, it kind of sticks out from your body and doesn't lay flat (or at least on me it does) so you can't wear it untucked or it's very unflattering It snags everything. Upon trying on it snagged when I took it out of the package and then my dog's nails got caught all in it so I have a few snags. It's in the white colorblock of the sweater though thankfully and not very noticeable. For the price I would definitely recommend, not too expensive and you are definitely getting what you pay for here, in a good way! Read more
items.author: Shaye Bryant

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality.
items.body: I was surprised at how the amazing quality of this sweater. Perfect fit in the chest and length, I do prefer my sleeves to come down a little longer, but it fits like it should. Read more
items.author: Christina

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars DON'T HESITATE TO BUY!
items.body: Let me start off by saying that this sweater made me write my first Amazon review ever! I order from Amazon daily and am typically pleased with the products (rarely have to return anything)... However, none of them gave me the urgency to take the time to write a review. When I saw this sweater, I really liked the color block patter and colors options. But I hesitated a bit to order. I am so glad that I didn't! I would be missing out! The color is just as shown, the sweater looks great on and is super buttery soft! The shipping was much faster than I anticipated, and I received it in just 2 days. I am ordering in more colors. Do yourself a favor and order it and thank me later. As a point of reference about sizing-- I am 5'4", 165 and I ordered a medium and it was a great fit. I like sweaters like this slightly oversized so it worked out great. There is definitely no need to size up with this one. Read more
items.author: Basia Adamczak

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Stylish!
items.body: Kept it, loved it, but it’s a little thicker in material than I’m comfortable with, but super cute! Read more
items.author: MissVictoriaJ

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful sweater!!
items.body: Great weight! love my sweater!! Read more
items.author: Amy Novak

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 243 Purple, Brown, 196 Pink, 196 Caramel, Blue, 216 Navy, 196 Khaki, Black, Camel, 216 Orange, 216 Khaki, Orange, 333 Hot Pink, Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
